title: It's 6am and Solo Ranked is open?
body: Does that mean its opened 24 hours or is this just a test? I can't seem to find any updates apart from the Dec 1st post about it closing from 4am - 7am.

replies.body: Depends where you live. Its open 7am AEDT (SYD /MELB). So that means 6am AEST (QLD).
